reviewText: Thank you for this rare film!
Women and men in peril is not the usual hardcore stories. Picture quality is not too bad but the movies are pretty short.  Only get this if you like old porn.
Poor movie son to waste your money .

Brings back the old days.  The quality of the film was quite good to see.  The stories are simple and almost laughable if not actually so.  The actors, both men and women do not look like people you will probably never personally be in the presence of, but pretty much look like the kind of everyday folks most people will be involved with.  Was definitely amusing enough to sit through and probably will some time again in the future.

If you are a little older and actually were around in those times i'm sure you will enjoy these stories.
